title: Crypto Investor Charged With Kidnapping and Torturing Man for Weeks
description: The investor, 37-year-old John Woeltz, and another man abused their victim for three weeks in a Manhattan townhouse as they tried to get his Bitcoin password, prosecutors say.

title: Accused crypto-kidnapper held without bail during Saturday court appearance
description: Kentucky-based cryptocurrency investor, John Woeltz, is accused of kidnapping and torturing an Italian businessman in a sadistic attempt to extort his Bitcoin password was ordered held without bail Saturday by a Manhattan judge.
